flow:{chr(10)}path={main_app.flow_path}{chr(10)}id={main_app.flow_id}
globals:{chr(10)}{chr(10).join(k + "=" + str(v) for k, v in locals().items() if k not in ("_d", "__builtins__"))}
help var globals:{chr(10)}{chr(10).join(k + "=" + str(v) for k, v in app.main_app.help_variables(dict(self=self, tap_widget=self))[0].items())}
help var locals: {chr(10)}{chr(10).join(k + "=" + str(v) for k, v in app.main_app.help_variables(dict(self=self, tap_widget=self))[1].items())}
locals:{chr(10)}{chr(10).join(k + "=" + str(v) for k, v in locals().items() if k not in ("_d", "__builtins__"))}
main ini(at {main_app._main_cfg_fnam}):{chr(10)}{chr(10).join(file_lines(main_app._main_cfg_fnam))}
paths:{chr(10)}{chr(10).join(k + "=" + p for k, p in PATH_PLACEHOLDERS.items())}
